${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:PlotPower.NAME: Plot
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPlot. Every time you play a seed card plot is reduced by 1. NL If plot is less than zero at the end of turn add a Void to the draw pile and set plot to 0.

${modID}:AnimalPower.NAME: Animal
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAnimal. If you have more animals at the end of your turn than you have maximum energy lose HP equal to the difference.
#yAnimals. If you have more animals at the end of your turn than you have maximum energy lose HP equal to the difference.

${modID}:ClintPower.NAME: Clint
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yTool, upgrade it. NL #yTools cannot be upgraded beyond +5.
